checkSignatures(bytes32,bytes,bytes).details: Checks whether the signature provided is valid for the provided data, hash. Will revert otherwise.

params.data: That should be signed (this is passed to an external validator contract)
params.dataHash: Hash of the data (could be either a message hash or transaction hash)
params.signatures: Signature data that should be verified. Can be ECDSA signature, contract signature (EIP-1271) or approved hash.

domainSeparator().details: Returns the domain separator for this contract, as defined in the EIP-712 standard.

enableModule(address).details: This can only be done via a Safe transaction.

execTransactionFromModule(address,uint25.details: Allows a Module to execute a Safe transaction without any further confirmations.

returns.success: Boolean flag indicating if the call succeeded.

params.pageSize: Maximum number of modules that should be returned.

enableModule(address).notice: Enables the module `module` for the Safe.

execTransactionFromModuleReturnData(addr.notice: Execute `operation` (0: Call, 1: DelegateCall) to `to` with `value` (Native Token) and return data
